Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the officer erred in determining the relationship was not genuine
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Inland permanent residence application under spousal sponsorship
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer found significant discrepancies in interviews affecting credibility
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Relationship not genuine, entered into primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in interview responses between applicant and sponsor
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged error in assessment of genuineness of relationship
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to administrative decision
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Documentary evidence given less weight than interview inconsistencies
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Genuine relationship required; burden on applicant to demonstrate authenticity
Crimes.Application_Factor: Nature and consistency of relationship details provided by both parties
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) and Regulations (IRPR)
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Existence of legal error, procedural fairness, factual sufficiency
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived lack of genuine spousal relationship
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies in testimony outweigh documentary support
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; officer considered all submissions
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant inconsistencies in joint and individual interviews
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged reasonableness and fairness of decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Weight given to oral vs. documentary evidence
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Failure to meet genuineness requirement under family class sponsorship

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the officer erred in determining the marriage was not genuine
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Inland sponsorship application for permanent residence
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Officer concluded marriage lacked genuineness due to inconsistencies
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered into primarily for immigration advantage
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in interview responses between spouses
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Documentary evidence considered but outweighed by credibility issues
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Requirement of a genuine marital relationship under IRPR
Crimes.Application_Factor: Consistency and plausibility of shared life details
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) and Regulations (IRPR)
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Potential legal error, procedural fairness, factual basis
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process deemed fair; opportunity to respond provided
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about authenticity of relationship based on interviews
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness and evidentiary weight
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Balancing of testimonial and documentary evidence
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Marriage not genuine under family class provisions
